result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Benjamin T Wills

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Benjamin T Wills - per defendant
Current: 626 Liberty St, Ripon, WI 54971 United States  (Effective: 04-15-2016)
Prior: 560 Fenton St Building A Apt 7, Ripon, WI 54971 United States

9:51 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - an agreement has been reached.  DA recites agreement - upon plea to count 1 in 2015CM232, the repeater will be dismissed, and count 2 and 2015CM231 are to be dismissed and read-in.  Defendant concurs.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.

Court goes over constitutional rights with the defendant - defendant waives these rights.  Court goes over the elements of each offense.  Court instructs defendant of the maximum penalty.  Court instructs defendant regarding deportation. 

Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY.  Court finds the plea is made freely, voluntarily, intelligently and understandingly.  Court finds there is a factual basis to support the plea.  Court finds the defendant guilty on resisting an offer and strikes the repeater.  Court orders count 2 on 2015CM232 and 2015CM231 be dismissed and read-in.  Court orders the judgment of conviction be entered here today.  DA confirms compliance with victim witness rights.  Sentencing statement by DA.  No statement by the defendant.

Court sentences the defendant to:

-120 days county jail, to commence within 60 days.  Huber.
-Court costs.  Court grants the defendant 60 days to pay or payment plan.
-Defendant is to submit a DNA Sample.

Court adjourned at 9:59 a.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 4, 2016 at 09:30 am.

9:13 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by DA - requests another date for plea & sentencing.  Court sets for plea & sentencing on April 4, 2016 at 9:30 a.m

Court adjourned at 9:14 a.m.

Per Amanda H, the defendant is in Fond du lac County Jail on a probation hold.
43

9:35 a.m.  Defendant present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - will not be getting an attorney and will accept the offer but needs more time.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court sets for Plea & Sentencing on February 9, 2016 at 9:15 a.m. 

Court adjourned at 9:37 a.m.

Defendant's grandmother called to inform us that the defendant is in FDL county jail serving a sentence and will be released at 12:01 a.m. on December 24th.  Mailing address on file is correct.
43

9:21 a.m.  Defendant in custody and present in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Statement by defendant - requests to talk with the DA.  Court goes over right to counsel.  Defendant waives right to counsel.  Court accepts waiver.  Court sets for Status Hearing on December 22, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.  Statement by Defendant regarding cash bond on 2015CM232.  No objection by DA to address the cash bond.  Statement by defendant regarding bond.  Statement by DA regarding bond.  Court modifies bond to $500.00 signature bond and all other conditions remain.

Court adjourned at 9:26 a.m.
Defendant in custody and present via video from the Green Lake County Jail.

2:03 p.m.  Defendant in custody and present via video from the Green Lake County Jail and in court without counsel.  Andrew Christenson for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaints and waives reading.  Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count.  Court finds probable cause.  Court instructs the defendant of his right to an attorney.  Defendant enters a plea of NOT GUILTY.  DA makes bond recommendation.  Court sets bond at 14CM232 $500 cash bond and condition of:  Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  2015CM231 - $500.00 signature bond.  Court will set for Status Hearing on November  24, 2015 at 9:15 a.m.

Court adjourned at 2:07 p.m.
